name: riboseq-translation-efficiency
title: Translation Efficiency Analysis (Ribosome Profiling)
description: Measure translation efficiency by comparing Ribo-seq and RNA-seq data. Quantifies which mRNAs are actively translated vs transcribed, revealing post-transcriptional regulation.
content:
Translation Efficiency Analysis

Ribosome profiling (Ribo-seq) captures ribosome-protected RNA fragments to measure active translation, revealing which mRNAs are being translated into proteins.

What Translation Efficiency Reveals

Translation efficiency = Ribo-seq signal / RNA-seq signal

  • Post-transcriptional Regulation: mRNA abundance vs protein production
  • Translational Control: Stress response, development, disease
  • Regulatory Elements: uORFs, IRES, codon optimality
  • Drug Response: Translation inhibitor effects

Scientific Applications

  • Cancer Research: Oncogene translation dysregulation
  • Neuroscience: Synaptic local translation
  • Viral Infection: Host shutoff and viral translation
  • Drug Development: Translation inhibitor screening
  • Disease Mechanisms: Ribosomopathies, neurodegeneration
  • Quality Control: Ribosome stalling, nonsense-mediated decay

Pipeline Features

  • Read Processing: Adapter trimming, rRNA depletion
  • Alignment: Specialized for ribosome footprints
  • ORF Prediction: Ribo-TISH, Ribotricer for translated regions
  • uORF Detection: Upstream open reading frames
  • Translation Efficiency: Ratio of Ribo-seq/RNA-seq
  • Metagene Profiles: Ribosome positioning around start/stop codons
  • Quality Metrics: Periodicity, frame preference

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet with columns:

  • sample: Sample identifier
  • fastq_1: Forward reads
  • fastq_2: Reverse reads (if paired-end)
  • strandedness: forward, reverse, or unstranded
  • type: riboseq (for Ribo-seq) or rnaseq (for matched RNA-seq)

Best Practice: Include both Ribo-seq and RNA-seq samples for translation efficiency analysis.

Key Outputs

  • Translation Efficiency: Gene-level TE scores
  • Predicted ORFs: Novel translated regions
  • uORF Annotations: Upstream regulatory ORFs
  • Metagene Plots: Ribosome positioning
  • Quality Metrics: 3-nt periodicity, frame distribution

Perfect for: Translation regulation • Post-transcriptional control • uORF discovery • Drug MOA studies • Disease mechanisms
